mapper.sql: select id, competition_name, check_status, enroll_end_time, competition_time, personnel_limit, competition_type, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from sys_competition_apply
mapper.select: select id, competition_name from sys_competition_apply where check_status = '1' and competition_type = '1' and del = '0'
select id, competition_name from sys_competition_apply where check_status = '1' and competition_type = '2' and del = '0'

SELECT COUNT(competition_name) as competition_name, CASE WHEN competition_type = '0' then '作品类赛事' WHEN competition_type = '1' then '答题类赛事' WHEN competition_type = '2' then '进度类赛事' WHEN competition_type = '3' then '线下赛事' end as competition_type FROM sys_competition_apply WHERE del = '1' GROUP BY competition_type
select id, competition_name from sys_competition_apply where check_status = '1' and competition_type = '0' and del = '0'

select apply.id as competitionId, apply.competition_name,question.question_answer,application.contestants,application.score, question.question_name from sys_competition_apply apply join sys_competition_question question on apply.id = question.competition_id join sys_competition_application application on apply.competition_name = application.competition_name where apply.competition_type = '1'
